title: A pithie and short treatise by vvay of dialogue, whereby a godly Christian is directed how to make his last will and testament to dispose well and wisely of his temporall goods; and how to prepare himselfe to the Lord, to depart this world peaceably and comfortably, committing himselfe in soule and body, into the hands of God, his faithfull Creatour.
author: Jones, William, b. 1581 or 2, attributed name.
publisher: Imprinted [by R. Field] for William Iones,
notes: Sometimes attributed to William Jones, preacher to the Isle of Wight.
Identified as STC 14746 on UMI microfilm.
Imperfect; stained and print show-through affecting text throughout.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
